text: Hawas ("Lust") is an Indian Hindi erotic thriller movie released in 2004. Like another Bollywood movie, Murder, it is an adaptation of the 2002 American film Unfaithful. Hawas is directed by Karan Razdan and stars Meghna Naidu, Shawar Ali and Tarun Arora in the lead roles.It is a tale of wealth, lust, betrayal and murder and has been shot exclusively in Dubai. ==Cast== * Shawar Ali...
